verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, even with every <S%H5057>leader<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, If it seem <S%H2895>good<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, and if it be of Jehovah our <S%H430>God<s%>, let us <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6555>abroad<s%> every where unto our <S%H251>brethren<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, with whom the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> that have <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, that they may gather themselves unto <S%H6908>us<s%>;
and let us bring <S%H5437>again<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1875>us<s%>: for we sought not unto it in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.
And all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that they would do <S%H6213>so<s%>; for the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3474>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%>, from the <S%H7883>Shihor<s%> the brook of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even unto the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> from <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H1173>Baalah<s%>, that <S%H7157>is<s%>, to Kiriath-jearim, which belonged to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> above the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, that is <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>Name<s%>.

And they <S%H7392>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> upon a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and brought it out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>: and <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> and <S%H283>Ahio<s%> <S%H5090>drove<s%> the <S%H5699>cart<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7832>played<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> with all their <S%H5797>might<s%>, even with <S%H7892>songs<s%>, and with <S%H3658>harps<s%>, and with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and with <S%H8596>timbrels<s%>, and with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, and with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> of <S%H3592>Chidon<s%>, <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H270>hold<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>; for the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> <S%H8058>stumbled<s%>.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H5798>Uzza<s%>, and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7971>him<s%>, because he put forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H727>ark<s%>; and there he <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2734>displeased<s%>, because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6556>broken<s%> <S%H6555>forth<s%> upon <S%H5798>Uzza<s%>; and he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6560>Perez-uzza<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1963>How<s%> shall I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of God home to <S%H430>me<s%>?

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> not the <S%H727>ark<s%> unto him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, but carried it <S%H5186>aside<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>.

And the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> with the <S%H1004>family<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and all that he had.
